Top Places to visit in Pedana, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Pedana is a municipality and the headquarters of Pedana Mandal under the Machilipatnam revenue division of Krishna district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is located at a distance of 8 km (5.0 mi) from the district headquarters, Machilipatnam.

title: Top Places to visit in Punganur, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Punganur is a town in Chittoor district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is the Mandal headquarters of Punganur Mandal in Madanapalle revenue division

title: Top Places to visit in Puttur, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Puttur is a city in Dakshina Kannada district, in the Karnataka state of India. It is the headquarters of Puttur taluk. It is the second-largest and the fastest-growing city in Dakshina Kannada district of Karnataka after Mangalore. The Puttur Shree Mahalingeshwara Temple is located here.

content:
Ramachandrapuram is a town in East Godavari district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. The town is a Municipality that serves as the headquarters of Ramachandrapuram Mandal and Ramachandrapuram revenue division.

title: Top Places to visit in Rayachoti, Andhra Pradesh
content: Rayachoty or "Rachaveedu" or "Rayachoti" or "Rajaveedu" is a town in Kadapa district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. title: Top Places to visit in Rayadurg, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Rayadurga is a town in the Anantapur district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is the headquarters of Rayadurgam Mandal in the Kalyandurg revenue division. The town is renowned for its Handloom industry.

title: Top Places to visit in Renigunta, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Renigunta is a census town in Chittoor District of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is a suburb of Tirupati and the Mandal headquarters of Renigunta Mandal.
